main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Huntington, West Virginia, on December 15, 1962, where an object larger than Venus and Jupiter was observed appearing stationary for about 5 minutes before moving at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was visible for a duration of 5-10 minutes., The object was compared to ECHO I satellite., Witness described the object as bright and steady, following a zig-zag course., The sighting was made from the top floor of a building at H.K. Porter Co., Inc., The weather was clear with a half-moon and some haze during the observation.
sighted object: an object larger than Venus and Jupiter
witness description: The witness described the object as a bright point of light in the sky, which initially resembled a star and later exhibited rapid movement.
